name: WORTHLY REVIVAL
description:
Whortly Revival Is "our" (my) first game jam project, at first "our" goal was to make a small c++ game in unreal engine with a theme "Death is only the beginning" but on the first day "we" realized that our c++ skills were not up to industry standards so "we" decided to switch back to "our" knowledge of blueprints and create this "masterpiece"

Play as a battle-hardened viking named whortly and discover what lies in an abandoned cave with futuristic-looking things scattered around, good luck and enjoy

Every asset is either "our" own "studio" sourced or free on unreal marketplace

music used under license (just mention cc as they said)

Lohstana David - 14 Metal 04

Snook - Heavy Metal Pussy

(source code is in download instructions)
